Class FastTreeTableItem

java.lang.Object

          org.gwt.mosaic.ui.client.treetable.FastTreeTableItem
All Implemented Interfaces:
com.google.gwt.user.client.EventListener, com.google.gwt.user.client.ui.HasHTML, com.google.gwt.user.client.ui.HasText, HasFastTreeTableItems
public class FastTreeTableItem
extends com.google.gwt.user.client.ui.Widget
implements com.google.gwt.user.client.ui.HasHTML, HasFastTreeTableItems

An item that can be contained within a FastTree.

Example
